history.proof: split. - intro H. hfcrush use: rem_prop, Nat.eq_0_gt_0_cases, divides_0, rem_0, divides_anti, Nat.add_0_r unfold: divides. - intro H. unfold divides. exists (div q p). scongruence use: div_rem_spec1, Nat.add_0_r.

original: intros p q. split. - intro H. destruct H as [n H]. rewrite div_rem_spec1 in H. rewrite H. apply rem_0. - intro H. unfold divides. exists (div q p). rewrite div_rem_spec1. rewrite H. apply rem_0.
